--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Wildrider walks forward and puts the large piece of metal inside
> Astrotrain. He then rummages for any other useful piece of 
equipment,
> and begins to fill those in as well.


    ::Domnijoe and Blindchaos::

    A minute or so later, Domnijoe returns. Before she transforms, 
Blindchaos leaps out of her cockpit and lands beside Astrotrain with 
an impressive, earthshaking rumble.
    "I made her come back." he says calmly, brushing the dirt from
his 
legs. He looks at Wildrider. He quietly surveys the situation, then 
helps him dig through the wreckage.
    Domnijoe looks truely ticked when she transforms. She hovers in 
the air and glowers at Blindchaos, her gaze like daggers. Privately 
she seeths over their shared words before their return. How she wants 
him to suffer! A momment later she begins loading Astrotrain, pouting 
horribly. She is none too gentle in her efforts.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions

**************************
